subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Craig Biggio homered after he was honored by Houston, and Lance Berkman hit a tie-breaking shot leading off the eighth to start a four-run rally that sent the host Astros to a 6-4 victory against the Milwaukee Brewers yesterday.
snippet: Craig Biggio homered after he was honored by Houston, and Lance Berkman hit a tie-breaking shot leading off the eighth to start a four-run rally that sent the host Astros to a 6-4 victory against the Milwaukee Brewers yesterday.
